summary: A neural network module that reconstructs an output sample from a latent representation by applying a series of configurable up‑sampling blocks, normalization and activation layers, effectively serving as the decoder part of a variational autoencoder.
business_intent: Enable generative AI applications such as image synthesis or data reconstruction by translating compact latent vectors back into high‑dimensional data, supporting flexible model architectures for production‑grade diffusion or VAE pipelines.
